clinical_study.brief_title: NAFLD in Diabetes Type 2 in Primary Care
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluating Prevalence and Severity of NAFLD In Primary Care

brief_summary.textblock: The EPSONIP (Evaluating Prevalence and Severity Of NAFLD In Primary care) trial is a longitudinal cohort study of patients with T2DM recruited from primary health care centers in Östergötland, Sweden. The latest MRI techniques will be used to quantify the amount of hepatic fat, inflammation, liver fibrosis and body composition. Each patient will be investigated twice with three years apart to determine patients with progressive disease.

primary_outcome.description: Number of patients with fatty liver measured with MR-PDFF
Number of patients with advanced liver disease (fibrosis stage > 2)

primary_outcome.measure: The association between physical activity and advanced liver disease (fibrosis >2)
primary_outcome.description: Liver fibrosis measured with MRE and liver biopsy. Physical activity measured with the international fitness scale (IFIS)

primary_outcome.measure: The association between physical activity and advanced liver disease (fibrosis >2)
primary_outcome.description: Liver fibrosis measured with MRE and liver biopsy. Physical activity measured with Actigraph GT3X (accelerometer)

primary_outcome.measure: The association between fitness and advanced liver disease (fibrosis >2)
primary_outcome.description: Liver fibrosis measured with MRE and liver biopsy. Fitness measured with the six minute walk test.

primary_outcome.measure: Genetic factors associated with advanced liver disease (fibrosis >2)
primary_outcome.description: Liver fibrosis measured with MRE and liver biopsy. Genes to be analyzed: PNPLA3, TM6SF2, MBOAT

secondary_outcome.measure: Health economic model for disease management
Number of patients that develop symptoms of end-stage liver disease
secondary_outcome.description: Symptoms of end-stage liver disease (ascites, encepahopathy, varices, HCC) or liver related Death will be recorded through chart review

biospec_descr.textblock: Serum, Plasma, DNA, RNA, liver tissue

study_pop.textblock: Consecutively enrolled patients with diabetes type 2 in primary care.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Diabetes type 2
- Age 35-75 year
Exclusion Criteria:
- Contraindication to MR
- Alcohol dependance
- Previously diagnosed liver cirrhosis
- Previously known liver disease (other than fatty liver)
